title: Deploy Data Sync Pro Configurations
overview: This recipe demonstrates how to deploy Data Sync Pro configurations between environments using a template downloaded from DSP.
generalUseCase: DSP enables the creation of reusable deployment templates for solutions built on record-based configurations, such as Data Sync Pro, nCino, CPQ, and Salesforce Revenue Cloud. These templates can be imported into any environment for ongoing customization and reuse in record-based configuration deployments.
